payload.content:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 1000 750" width="1000" height="750">
  <!-- 3-Level Pyramid Template - 25% Larger (Proportionally Scaled) with Light Colors -->
  
  
  <!-- Background -->
  <rect width="1000" height="750" fill="#ffffff"/>
  
  <!-- 
    Pyramid geometry - 25% proportionally larger:
    Original: 800x600, pyramid base 400px, height 305px
    New: 1000x750, pyramid base 500px, height 381px (all × 1.25)
    
    - Apex: (500, 188) - was (400, 150)
    - Base: from (250, 569) to (750, 569) - 500px wide (was 400px)
    - Total height: 381px (was 305px)
    - Heights (all × 1.25): 
      - Level 1: 150px (was 120px)
      - Level 2: 116px (was 92.5px)
      - Level 3: 103px (was 82.5px)
    - Level boundaries: y=338 (was 270), y=459 (was 367.5), y=569 (was 455)
    - 6px gaps between levels (was 5px)
    - Same slope ratio maintained: 250/381 = 0.656
  -->
  
  <!-- Level 3 (Bottom) - from y=466 to y=569 (height: 103px) -->
  <path id="level_3_fill" d="M 256 569 L 744 569 L 676 466 L 324 466 Z" 
        fill="#cddffc" stroke="#cddffc" stroke-width="2"/>
  <text id="level_3_text" x="500" y="538" text-anchor="middle" 
        font-family="Inter, sans-serif" font-size="18" font-weight="500" fill="#000000">
    Foundation Level
  </text>
  
  <!-- Level 2 (Middle) - from y=344 to y=459 (height: 115px) -->
  <path id="level_2_fill" d="M 330 459 L 670 459 L 594 344 L 406 344 Z" 
        fill="#84b0f9" stroke="#84b0f9" stroke-width="2"/>
  <text id="level_2_text" x="500" y="425" text-anchor="middle" 
        font-family="Inter, sans-serif" font-size="18" font-weight="500" fill="#ffffff">
    Core Level
  </text>
  
  <!-- Level 1 (Top) - triangle from apex to y=338 (height: 150px) -->
  <path id="level_1_fill" d="M 410 338 L 590 338 L 500 188 Z" 
        fill="#f63980" stroke="#f63980" stroke-width="2"/>
  <!-- Text positioned towards bottom of the level for better wrapping space -->
  <text id="level_1_text" x="500" y="306" text-anchor="middle" 
        font-family="Inter, sans-serif" font-size="18" font-weight="500" fill="#ffffff">
    Strategic Planning Pyramid - Level 1
  </text>
  
  <!-- Title -->
  </svg>

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 800 600">
    <defs>
        <script type="application/mermaid+json">{
            "code": "flowchart TD
    A[User enters credentials]
    B{System validates}
    C[Create session]
    D[Redirect to dashboard]
    E[Show error]
    F[Increment failed attempts counter]
    G{Failed attempts < 3?}
    H[Lock account for 15 minutes]
    I(((Login Success)))
    J(((Account Locked)))

    A --> B
    B -- "Valid" --> C
    C --> D
    D --> I
    B -- "Invalid" --> E
    E --> F
    F --> G
    G -- "Yes" --> A
    G -- "No" --> H
    H --> J",
            "theme": "default",
            "themeVariables": {
                "primaryColor": "#10B981",
                "background": "#FFFFFF"
            }
        }</script>
    </defs>
    <rect width="800" height="600" fill="#FFFFFF"/>
    <text x="400" y="300" text-anchor="middle" fill="#1F2937">
        [Mermaid Diagram - Client Render]
    </text>
</svg>

metadata.mermaid_code:
flowchart TD
    A[User enters credentials]
    B{System validates}
    C[Create session]
    D[Redirect to dashboard]
    E[Show error]
    F[Increment failed attempts counter]
    G{Failed attempts < 3?}
    H[Lock account for 15 minutes]
    I(((Login Success)))
    J(((Account Locked)))

    A --> B
    B -- "Valid" --> C
    C --> D
    D --> I
    B -- "Invalid" --> E
    E --> F
    F --> G
    G -- "Yes" --> A
    G -- "No" --> H
    H --> J
